name: Baby's First Driving Sim
description:
Race as fast as you can to get to the parking spot in this short arcade-like racing game! 

FEATURES:

* Inspired by a children's toy, you will use the interface to move your vehicle around. 
* You lose fuel every second that passes, so go fast...
* ...But corners are tight and your vehicle's turning is loose, so be careful!
* Five different difficulties to play on (Newborn, Infant, Toddler, Kid, and Big Kid). 
* Newborn difficulty is a casual experience where you can take your time.
*This is not an easy game, so be prepared to fail a few times!
*Beating the game unlocks a 3D mode to play in.

HOW TO PLAY:
Just unzip the files and launch the .exe
